revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The arts of logick and rhetorick, illustrated by examples taken out of the best authors, antient [sic] and modern, in all the polite languages. Interpreted and expla..."
revision.text: Possibly: The arts of logick and rhetorick, illustrated by examples taken out of the best authors, antient [sic] and modern, in all the polite languages. Interpreted and explan'd / by that learned and judicious critick, Father Bouhours. To which are added, parallel quotations...[Translated and paraphrased from La mani√®re de bien penser by J. Oldmixon]. (Dominique Bouhours; John Oldmixon). (London : Printed for John Clark and Richard Hett, John Pemberton, Richard Ford, and John Gray, 1728). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1303876~S1
